modules.description: Provides functions for initializing and finalizing MPI communication, sending and receiving messages between processes, and determining process rank and size. Operates with MPI communicator objects, message tags, and process identifiers. Used to coordinate parallel computations, distribute workloads, and aggregate results across multiple nodes.

This module offers point-to-point and collective MPI communication operations, including sending/receiving data, broadcasting, scattering, gathering, reducing, and all-to-all distributions, tailored for numerical data types, arrays, and multidimensional bigarrays. It handles communicators, groups, ranks, and requests, enabling efficient parallel processing of structured data across distributed systems. Use cases include synchronizing computations, aggregating results, and distributing workloads in high-performance computing scenarios.
